content.text:
# Edward B. Smith & Co.

#REDIRECT Morgan Stanley Wealth Management
Edward Brinton Smith was the Smith in Smith Barney. In 2022 there are currently 3 Edward B Smith's alive in his lineage, the 4th, 5th, and 6th. The family is no longer involved in any financial group. For a history of Smith Barney go to the Morgan Stanley page.
